data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2ZrGLULl7wQQ7kNvgH60Tdj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBudYymhC1PmtAUcrwkfiVVRXWBiQjxWtL1tbmNPq2-vA&oe=665C55B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pwbfz4z-wWoQ7kNvgEuEXom&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCUQel-vsOqu16jUnsavx7SYXGArx6jYFDBHXskkU9IuA&oe=665C6352)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vI3KTDSHuXQQ7kNvgGErxQN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCYy9T_0ZDihHF7sDRlluqoYCQJ5qE-e6hcTK6SkJTXfQ&oe=665C66D0)
